name: Nehru Yuva Samajik Samarasata Seva Samiti
briefDescription: Nehru Yuva Samajik Samarasata Sewa Samiti (NYSSSS) is a civil society organization (CSO) is registered under Societies Registration Act, 1860. Formed in 2000 when some youth fellows took initiatives with constructive thinking that they will work for those people who isolated with the main stream of development of rural area. Later on people like the ideology of NYSSSS, Rajdiha, Haldharpur, Mau, UP and finally it has been registered in 2002.  During the period NYSSSS took many small but important issues of the society and completed successfully.                Organization is working on Empowering the community through people participation by developing community based organization (CBOs) of women & youth The Most beneficiaries are contributing to social change to cover the  Women, Youth and children from deprived community through Establish social harmony, Women empowerment,  Health & Nutrition (maternal, adolescent & child) Child right, Education & Literacy, livelihood. Presently organization is working in three district of eastern UP (Mau, Ballia and Ghazipur)
